00037 namespace Hyperspace {
00038   using namespace Hypertable;
00039 
00040   class Event : public ReferenceCount {
00041   public:
00042     Event(uint32_t mask) : m_mask(mask), m_notification_count(0) {
00043       ScopedLock lock(ms_next_event_id_mutex);
00044       m_id = ms_next_event_id++;
00045       return;
00046     }
00047     virtual ~Event() { return; }
00048 
00049     uint64_t get_id() { return m_id; }
00050 
00051     uint32_t get_mask() { return m_mask; }
00052 
00053     void increment_notification_count() {
00054       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00055       m_notification_count++;
00056     }
00057     void decrement_notification_count() {
00058       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00059       m_notification_count--;
00060       if (m_notification_count == 0)
00061         m_cond.notify_all();
00062     }
00063     void wait_for_notifications() {
00064       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00065       if (m_notification_count != 0)
00066         m_cond.wait(lock);
00067     }
00068 
00069     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() = 0;
00070     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) = 0;
00071 
00072   protected:
00073 
00074     static Mutex         ms_next_event_id_mutex;
00075     static uint64_t      ms_next_event_id;
00076 
00077     Mutex             m_mutex;
00078     boost::condition  m_cond;
00079     uint64_t m_id;
00080     uint32_t m_mask;
00081     uint32_t m_notification_count;
00082   };
00083 
00084   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Event> HyperspaceEventPtr;

00091   class EventNamed : public Event {
00092   public:
00093     EventNamed(uint32_t mask, const std::string &name)
00094         : Event(mask), m_name(name) { return; }
00095 
00096     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() {
00097       return 12 + Hypertable::Serialization::encoded_length_vstr(m_name);
00098     }
00099 
00100     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00101       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00102       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00103       cbuf->append_vstr(m_name);
00104     }
00105 
00106   private:
00107     std::string m_name;
00108   };

00115   class EventLockAcquired : public Event {
00116   public:
00117     EventLockAcquired(uint32_t mode)
00118       : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED), m_mode(mode) { return; }
00119 
00120     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 16; }
00121     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00122       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00123       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00124       cbuf->append_i32(m_mode);
00125     }
00126   private:
00127     uint32_t m_mode;
00128   };

00134   class EventLockReleased : public Event {
00135   public:
00136     EventLockReleased() : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED) { return; }
00137     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 12; }
00138     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00139       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00140       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00141     }
00142   };

00148   class EventLockGranted : public Event {
00149   public:
00150     EventLockGranted(uint32_t mode, uint64_t generation)
00151       : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED), m_mode(mode), m_generation(generation)
00152       { }
00153 
00154     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 24; }
00155     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00156       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00157       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00158       cbuf->append_i32(m_mode);
00159       cbuf->append_i64(m_generation);
00160     }
00161   private:

00163     uint64_t m_generation;
00164   };
